title: Feng Cao (Jeff)
body:
IP Objective: Feng Cao, Plian Founder
Minimum Fund Raising Target: 5000
Maximum Fund Raising Target: 100000
Stake Pool Start Date: 2021.12.01   17:30
Stake Pool End Time: 2021.12.02   00:00

Dr. Feng Cao is the Founder of former PCHAIN. Now rebrand to PLIAN. He is the inventor of the 1st International Blockchain patent in China, the Co-Founder of ChinaLedger, the Chief Scientist and Co-Founder of Blockchain Application Committee in China Federation of Logistic and Purchasing (The 1st Gov Association in Industry), Senior Fellow of the China Blockchain Research Alliance. Dr. Feng Cao and his team successfully accomplished the 1st blockchain-based assets earning rights transfer in the world in September 2016, which is also the 1st Financial Blockchain Transaction in China.

He was the manager of the Big Data Analytics department, the Chief Scientist of Internet Finance and the co-chair of the patent review board in IBM Research-China. Dr Feng Cao’s innovative achievements have been successfully adopted in China, US and other 150 countries. He achieved IBM Global Technical Achievement Awards 3 times. He published 22 papers in ACM/IEEE top conference and 30+ international patents.
author: 0x9c32555C64879004AC20a2192557eC48a2e4b807
